comments.text: I've been following the research on FoxP1 and its implications in neurological disorders. It's fascinating how one gene can have such diverse effects.
Does anyone know if there are any new treatments targeting FoxP1 in development? Last I heard, there were a couple of promising studies.
It's incredible to see the community come together to discuss FoxP1. There's still so much to learn, but the discussions here are really insightful.
